Now, write the following sections of the policy memo, following this outline:

IV. Recommendation

Assessment of the loan structure based on the critique
- not a good loan structure, interest rate is too high and loan term is too short.

Recommendation on whether or not FCI should support this loan initiative and Discussion of potential ways to improve the loan structure or address any identified concerns
- revenue backed loan may be feasible and a good option if grant funding is not available, however if FCI supports this effort, they must find a way to provide a better interest rate and a longer loan term for the project.
- grant funding will certainly help, but does not make a big difference at small amounts

V. Conclusion

Recap of key points and main recommendation
Call to action for FCI and the international community to continue working towards providing sustainable and equitable access to clean water in developing countries.
